metadata.synopsis: Angry demonstator. Part of a mob of irate tieflings who have gathered to protest the druids' actions. They fear the druids will place them in danger in order to protect the grove. Later, the druids might stand down and the tiefling might remark upon this in a calmer tone.

0.speaker: Xeph
0.text: This place ain't so special. Why were the druids so protective of it?
0.context: NodeContext: Calmer than before - druids have stood down

2.speaker: Xeph
2.text: We could help each other - fight the goblins together. Instead these fools are trying to chase us away!
2.context: NodeContext: Angry. Starts talking to the player about how the druids mistreat the tielfings.

3.speaker: Xeph
3.text: Look at them, trying to pretend we don't exist. Hey, you lot - I'm going nowhere!
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: 2nd sentence directed at druid guards, not playerNodeContext: Angry. Starts talking to the player about how the druids mistreat the tielfings. Shouts the second sentence at the druids, who are a short distance away.
